00020 #ifndef AGG_MATH_INCLUDED
00021 #define AGG_MATH_INCLUDED
00022 
00023 #include <math.h>
00024 
00025 namespace agg
00026 {
00027 
00028     const double intersection_epsilon = 1.0e-8;
00029 
00030     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031     inline double calc_point_location(double x1, double y1, 
00032                                       double x2, double y2, 
00033                                       double x,  double y)
00034     {
00035         return (x - x2) * (y2 - y1) - (y - y2) * (x2 - x1);
00036     }
00037 
00038 
00039     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040     inline double calc_distance(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
00041     {
00042         register double dx = x2-x1;
00043         register double dy = y2-y1;
00044         return sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
00045     }
00046 
00047 
00048     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049     inline double calc_point_line_distance(double x1, double y1, 
00050                                            double x2, double y2, 
00051                                            double x,  double y)
00052     {
00053         register double dx = x2-x1;
00054         register double dy = y2-y1;
00055         return ((x - x2) * dy - (y - y2) * dx) / sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
00056     }
00057 
00058 
00059     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060     inline bool calc_intersection(double ax, double ay, double bx, double by,  
00061                                   double cx, double cy, double dx, double dy,
00062                                   double* x, double* y)
00063     {
00064         double num = (ay-cy) * (dx-cx) - (ax-cx) * (dy-cy);
00065         double den = (bx-ax) * (dy-cy) - (by-ay) * (dx-cx);
00066         if(fabs(den) < intersection_epsilon) return false;
00067         double r = num / den;
00068         *x = ax + r * (bx-ax);
00069         *y = ay + r * (by-ay);
00070         return true;
00071     }
00072 
00073 
00074     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075     inline void calc_orthogonal(double thickness, 
00076                                 double x1, double y1, 
00077                                 double x2, double y2, 
00078                                 double* x, double* y)
00079     {
00080         double dx = x2 - x1;
00081         double dy = y2 - y1;
00082         double d = sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy); 
00083         *x = thickness * dy / d;
00084         *y = thickness * dx / d;
00085     }
00086 
00087 
00088 
00089 
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 #endif
